modShortDescription: Removed the open/close times from traders so they always remain open (tested with Trader Jen and seems to work).
modDescription:
Removed the open/close times from traders so they always remain open (tested with Trader Jen and seems to work).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-AlwaysOpenTrader)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19558-khaines-a19-modlets-bigger-backpacks-backpack-buttons-hp-bars-etc/).
